item.title: 德国当日电价因风力不足和需求增加而跳涨
item.description: 由于风力发电量仍然较低，而预计电力需求增加，德国电力价格飙升。【原文：German power prices surged as wind generation remained low and projected electricity demand increased.】

item.title: 欧洲贷款银行寄希望于 M&A 的复兴来提高贷款量
item.description: 2024 年，再融资帮助提高了欧洲的贷款额度，但随着并购活动看起来终于有了起色，银行家们认为过桥融资的潮流终于要转向了。【原文：Refinancings helped bolster European loan volumes in 2024 but with mergers and acquisitions looking like they’re finally picking up, bankers believe the tide is finally turning for bridge financings.】

item.title: 中国监察机构责令特姆普公司整改退款政策
item.description: 中国最高市场监管部门传唤了点点客控股有限公司（PDD Holdings Inc.【原文：China’s top markets watchdog summoned PDD Holdings Inc. executives to order the company to fix its refunds-first policy, taking aim at a practice that a growing number of merchants argue hurts their bottom line.】

item.title: 据说日本央行认为等待下一次加息代价不大
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员认为等待加息的代价不大，但仍对下周加息持开放态度，具体取决于数据和市场发展情况。【原文：Bank of Japan officials see little cost to waiting before raising interest rates while still being open to a hike next week depending on data and market developments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国推出债务减免措施以偿还 260 亿美元贷款
item.description: 泰国公布了一套新的债务减免措施，以帮助数百万陷入还贷困境的零售借款人和小企业，这是泰国政府为解决东南亚最高家庭债务水平而采取的最新举措。【原文：Thailand unveiled a fresh set of debt-relief measures to cover millions of retail borrowers and small businesses struggling to repay loans, the latest bid by authorities to tackle the highest level of household debt in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 韩国政治动荡不安，经济面临风险
item.description: 韩国财政部长周三表示，韩国正面临更大的经济下行风险，因为韩国正努力减轻上周宣布戒严引发的动荡对其货币的影响。【原文：South Korea is facing greater downside economic risks as it tries to mitigate the impact on its currency of the turmoil triggered by last week’s martial law declaration, its finance minister said Wednesday.】

item.title: 前摩根大通交易员被控欺骗称自己被错误解雇
item.description: 一位前摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：An ex-JPMorgan Chase & Co. commodities trader sued the investment bank for unfair dismissal, alleging he was wrongly accused of spoofing cocoa trades to “appease” regulators.】

item.title: 日产汽车出了什么问题？这家日本汽车制造商如何才能生存下去？
item.description: 日产汽车公司再次陷入困境。在美国和中国的销售疲软引发巨额亏损后，日产汽车公司高层别无选择，只能裁员、削减五分之一的产能并下调年度利润预期。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. is fighting for its life, again. One of Japan’s flagship brands is on the brink after weak sales in the US and China triggered huge losses that left top brass with little choice but to cut jobs, slash a fifth of the carmaker’s manufacturing capacity and lower its annual profit forecast.】

item.title: 据说 SK 集团正在探索出售越南 Imexpharm 公司的大部分股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，SK 集团正在考虑出售其持有的 Imexpharm Pharmaceutical JSC 公司 65% 的股份。【原文：SK Group is considering selling its 65% stake in Imexpharm Pharmaceutical JSC, people with knowledge of the matter said, after the Vietnamese drug and medical product maker’s shares soared this year.】

item.title: EDF 提高法国 2024 年核电生产目标
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）提高了今年法国核电产出的目标，理由是在管理核电厂停机维护以及检查和维修破裂管道方面取得了进展。【原文：Electricite de France SA raised a target for French nuclear output this year, citing progress in managing plant maintenance outages, as well as checks and repairs of cracked pipes.】

item.title: 电动汽车出口受挫，中国汽车集团寻求延长补贴期限
item.description: 中国最大的汽车制造商行业组织敦促政府扩大对旧车交易的优惠，这是在电动汽车出口下降的情况下刺激国内汽车销量的措施之一。【原文：China’s biggest industry group for automobile makers urged the government to extend concessions for trading in older vehicles, as part of measures to spur domestic car sales amid a drop in electric vehicle exports.】

item.title: 豪瑟表示，澳大利亚央行将保持警惕，随时准备对特朗普关税做出反应
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）周三表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的关税建议对澳大利亚通胀的影响 "模棱两可"，因为可变因素很多，但储备银行将保持警惕，随时准备在必要时做出反应。【原文：Fallout on Australian inflation from President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs is “ambiguous” given the wide range of variables, but the Reserve Bank will be alert and ready to respond as needed, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said Wednesday.】

item.title: 通胀读数比股市显示的更重要
item.description: 尽管抗击通胀的斗争可能已基本取得胜利，但物价压力的紧张局势仍可能扰乱人们对降息的信心。股市似乎对这些警告视而不见。【原文：While the fight against inflation may largely have been won, tensions over price pressures could still disrupt confidence about interest-rate cuts. The stock market seems to be looking past these warnings.】

item.title: 韩国银行加大流动性注入力度以平息市场波动
item.description: 在政治动荡爆发后，韩国银行加大了向金融市场注入现金的力度，并誓言提供 "无限流动性"。【原文：The Bank of Korea stepped up injections of cash into the financial market as it vowed “unlimited liquidity” in the wake of a flare-up in political turmoil.】

item.title: 南非通货膨胀率九个月来首次上升
item.description: 南非的通货膨胀率九个月来首次上升，支持了决策者在评估新风险时对降息采取的谨慎态度。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate crept up for the first time in nine months, supporting policymakers’ cautious approach to rate cuts as they evaluate new risks.】

item.title: 对冲基金初创公司减少，基金经理面临收费压力
item.description: 近 5 万亿美元的对冲基金行业正在经历数十年来最艰难的时期之一，如何说服注重费用的投资者为新的市场参与者掏出现金？【原文：The near-$5 trillion hedge fund industry is having one of the toughest years in decades in convincing fee-conscious investors to fork out cash for new market players.】

item.title: 前软银创雨者阿克谢-纳赫塔（Akshay Naheta）有意出售其稳定币初创公司的股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，软银集团前高管阿克谢-纳赫塔（Akshay Naheta）正就出售其联合创办的稳定币支付初创公司的少数股权进行早期谈判。【原文：Akshay Naheta, a former SoftBank Group Corp. executive known for overseeing some of its biggest deals, is in early talks to sell a minority stake in the stablecoin payments startup he co-founded, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波兰能源公司 Orlen 因成本膨胀而终止关键石化项目
item.description: 波兰最大的能源公司 Orlen SA 正在退出其最大的石化投资项目，因为这家由政府控制的公司的新管理层正试图控制其前任计划的支出。【原文：Poland’s largest energy company Orlen SA is pulling out of its biggest petrochemical investment as the new management of the government-controlled firm seeks to rein in spending planned by its predecessors.】

item.title: 波兰财政部长称降低利率将有助于经济发展
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）表示，降低利率将有利于投资，并补充说与中央银行之间存在沟通问题。【原文：Poland’s Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski said lower interest rates would be supportive for investments, adding that there are communication problems with the central bank.】

item.title: 有报道称中国考虑在 2025 年使用弱势货币，人民币因此下滑
item.description: 有报道称，中国政府正在考虑允许人民币在明年走软，以应对与美国的贸易战威胁，人民币因此创下一周来最大跌幅。【原文：China’s yuan slid the most in a week on a report that Beijing is considering allowing the currency weaken next year in response to the threat of a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 津巴布韦希望在新采矿项目中获得 26% 的自由股份
item.description: 津巴布韦计划以自由结转的方式持有新采矿项目 26% 的股份，还将与现有运营商谈判，以获得类似的股份。【原文：Zimbabwe is planning to hold 26% of new mining projects on a free carry basis, and will also negotiate with existing operators to acquire a similar stake.】

item.title: Zalando 将以 13 亿美元收购德国零售商 About You
item.description: 德国在线时尚零售商Zalando SE同意以约12亿欧元（13亿美元）的价格收购竞争对手About You Holding SE，以期在欧洲电子商务市场占据主导地位。【原文：Zalando SE, the German online fashion retailer, agreed to buy rival About You Holding SE for about €1.2 billion ($1.3 billion), in a bid to dominate Europe’s e-commerce market..】

item.title: 阿联酋金融科技公司从花旗银行获得 5 亿美元资产支持融资
item.description: 花旗集团将向阿布扎比 Astra Tech 公司的一家子公司提供 5 亿美元的贷款，这是阿拉伯联合酋长国金融科技公司获得的最大单笔融资之一。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is extending $500 million to a subsidiary of Abu Dhabi’s Astra Tech, marking one of the largest single financing facilities secured by a United Arab Emirates-based fintech firm.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀加速，政治混乱为前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 罗马尼亚通货膨胀率连续第二个月加速上升，原因是一场突如其来的政治危机给经济前景蒙上了阴影，并限制了中央银行放松货币政策的空间。【原文：Romanian inflation accelerated for a second month in a row as an unexpected political crisis clouds the outlook and limits the central bank’s scope to ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 斯坦查特招聘私人银行业务人员，瞄准阿联酋的财富热潮
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）正在增加其在阿拉伯联合酋长国的私人银行业务员工人数，这是最近一家希望在该国超级富豪市场分得更大一杯羹的国际银行。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is boosting its private banking headcount in the United Arab Emirates, the latest international bank looking to capture a bigger slice of the country’s market for the ultra-wealthy.】

item.title: 随着假日购物的开始，Zara 所有者的销售增长放缓
item.description: Zara 的所有者 Inditex SA 报告称，在关键的假日购物季伊始，销售增长放缓，导致股价暴跌。【原文：Inditex SA, the owner of Zara, reported slower sales growth at the outset of the crucial holiday shopping season, sending shares tumbling.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市扩大跌幅，英镑兑欧元维持高位
稳定币发行商 Circle 与 Binance 合作扩大加密货币产品范围
item.description: 稳定币USDC的发行商Circle Internet Financial Ltd.和加密货币交易所Binance表示，作为加速发展计划的一部分，他们将合作扩大该代币在交易平台上的使用。【原文：Circle Internet Financial Ltd., the issuer of the stablecoin USDC, and the crypto exchange Binance said they’re partnering to expand the use of the token on the trading platform as part of a plan to accelerate growth.】

item.title: 您将获得私人资产，并乐在其中
item.description:
养老基金经理们越来越发现，TINA 已经被私有化了。即使回报令人失望，他们也别无选择，只能随波逐流。【原文：

Pension fund managers increasingly find that TINA has been privatized. There’s no choice but to go along, even if returns disappoint. 

】

item.title: 外国基金连续抛售马来西亚股票，创 2021 年以来最长纪录
item.description: 由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政策的不确定性抑制了新兴市场的情绪，截至周二，外国投资者已连续15个交易日抛售马来西亚股票。【原文：Foreign investors sold Malaysian equities for 15 straight sessions through Tuesday as uncertainty over US President-elect Donald Trump’s policies dampened sentiment in emerging markets.】
